pages.title: Stone Circles
pages.text: Stone Circles are ancient structures made of pillars on top of which sit Runestones. Throwing an enderpearl into those Runestones will teleport you to a point of interest. Who knows where you will end up?$(br)Stone Circles in the $(l:exploration/outerlands)Outerlands$() seem to gather a lot of interest from Illagers and Pillagers, who will often leave a trail behind them...
Runestones are only obtainable with the Silk Touch enchantment.
